bill_title: Expressing appreciation to the South Dakota Association of Healthcare Organizations for providing the annual Legislative Health Screening.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Expressing appreciation to the South Dakota Association of Healthcare Organizations for providing the annual Legislative Health Screening. WHEREAS, the South Dakota Association of Health Care Organizations took time to provide a free health screening for legislators and their spouses; and WHEREAS, the South Dakota Association of Health Care Organizations followed up with a consultation to discuss the results of the various screenings; and WHEREAS, the South Dakota Association of Healthcare Organizations provided pedometers so legislators are able to track the number of steps taken in a day: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that its appreciation be extended to the South Dakota Association of Healthcare Organizations for providing the annual Legislative Health Screening.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Expressing appreciation to the South Dakota Association of Healthcare Organizations for providing the annual Legislative Health Screening. WHEREAS, the South Dakota Association of Health Care Organizations took time to provide a free health screening for legislators and their spouses; and WHEREAS, the South Dakota Association of Health Care Organizations followed up with a consultation to discuss the results of the various screenings; and WHEREAS, the South Dakota Association of Healthcare Organizations provided pedometers so legislators are able to track the number of steps taken in a day: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that its appreciation be extended to the South Dakota Association of Healthcare Organizations for providing the annual Legislative Health Screening.
